description: This source file defines a global exception handler for a Spring Boot application, providing centralized handling of various exceptions and returning JSON-formatted error responses.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring ControllerAdvice class that handles application-wide exceptions and returns structured JSON error responses.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles NotFoundException by returning a 404 JSON response with error details.

methods.name: handleBadRequest
methods.description: Handles invalid argument exceptions (including validation errors) by returning a 400 JSON response.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles all other exceptions by returning a 500 JSON response with a generic error message.
